description:
Quick Grader  is an easy to use grading tool for teachers. This tool helps school teachers with the repetitive task of grading student exams, tests or homeworks.

Just enter the number of questions and compute the grading scale easily....

----
From David 
My easy graders are always growing legs and going missing! No more trips to the teacher store to buy replacements! Whoohoo!! Just what i needed! Thanks
----
From Gretchen
Makes grading papers on the go easier. Not having a paper ez grader is one less thing to keep up with.
